entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
